name: 8pad
short_description: This is a one man team, me and i am coding a text editor called 8Pad. It is meant to be ligth and used in loats of things. If you want a simple Text Editor and fancy as Word and Excel well you are on the wrong page. The main point is coding and making a large database of plugins. I can easly implement a new piece of code if a plugin needs something to work. Loats will be added and more. The editor is ligth and can load text files of size of 27mb or more in 9 - 10 seconds, while Notepad just crashes. There is loats of possible stuff it could do. Check out everything and maybe download today, and make it more popular. I really need support. Said that i have put all the information on the table. There is more......
summary: Very ligth text editor. With plugins and more....
